title: Eco-friendly amidation of oxidized carbon black by dry ball milling
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00216D, Paper

Aida Kiani, Marco Palumbo, Maria Rosaria Acocella
An unprecedented amidation of oxidized carbon black (oCB) by mechanochemical approach is reported. The reaction proceeds in the presence of octadecylamine (ODA) in a short time, providing the corresponding adduct...
